body.name: KIDISLE Single Serve Coffee Machine, 3 in 1 Pod Coffee Maker for K Cup Pods & Ground Coffee & Teas, 6 to 14oz Brew Sizes, with 40oz Removable Water Reservoir, Self-cleaning Function, White

Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 40 mins
features: 【3 IN 1 BREWING FUNCTION】This pod coffee maker is equipped with 2 adaptors and reusable capsule, which is compatible with any K cup of normal brand, and also supports brewing your favorite ground coffee or tea.
【FITS ANYWHERE】Less than 5.1” wide, fits neatly on your countertop.
【5 CUP SIZES】Brew an 6, 8, 10, 12,or 14 oz. cup for every occasion.
【TRAVEL MUG FRIENDLY】Removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.2” tall.

【SELF-CLEANING FUNCTION】Press and hold 'SIZE' and 'BREW' at the same time to enable the automatic cleaning function. By using this function once every two months, the coffee maker can effectively avoid clogging problems and extend its life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KIDISLE 3 IN 1 SLIM COFFEE MAKER The ultimate brewing companion for all your coffee and tea needs! This versatile machine is designed to brew both K-cup pods and ground coffee, as well as teas, giving you a wide range of options to satisfy your beverage cravings.
Previous page Next page 1 For K-cup 2 For Tea 3 For Coffee Ground
Rapid Brew, Ideal Temperature, Smart Standby: Coffee Perfection!

Efficient Maintenance Features for Your Coffee Maker Cleaning Cycle Reminder After 300 cycles, the CLEAN light flash to remind you to clean and descale your coffee maker. Self-cleaning Function Press and hold 'SIZE' and 'BREW' at the same time to enable the automatic cleaning function. Dredge Needle Use to clean the water outlet pin and the capsule adapter pin to avoid blockage. Removal Reservoir & Drip Tray Remove the water tank and drip tray for easy cleaning and maintenance.

What's included in the package when I buy this coffee maker? Coffee maker, accessories, manual, troubleshooting card. How do I use the self-cleaning function? Simply press and hold both 'SIZE' and 'BREW' buttons simultaneously for a few seconds. Why are the buttons not responding when I press them? Whether the lights are flashing, if yes, the lid isn’t securely closed. If no, ensure your hands are dry when using the buttons for optimal responsiveness. Why does the machine make a noise during operation? The coffee maker may produce some noise, particularly when heating water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coffee maker Delight
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy everything about this coffee pot. My coffee taste better. It is easy and quick to use. Not just for one cup and not for larger or many cups. Lighter to work with. Just the right amount for me of two and half cups depending on the size I use. Two 12 oz cups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lil coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Very happy w/ this purchase! It's space-saving and not cluttery. No frills, but does exactly what it needs to do, which is 1 good cup of coffee at a time, only takes a few minutes and temperature is ideal.The sensor-like buttons were a little hard to push at first, but after a few uses, they 'loosened' up and operate easily now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently wrote a review for this coffee maker after a hose on the inside split and it started leaking from the bottom after only 9 months. I sent a message to the seller and they responded quickly and tried to solve the problem by sending me the part. When they found out the part was on the inside they immediately offered to send a replacement machine. Customer service doesn't get any better than that. Based on my experience I can recommend doing business with them. The machine was fine and made great coffee until that hose split. For all I know the hose might have been faulty when it was put on at the factory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We replaced a kuieg with this. It is smaller but much easier to use. Power on, size cup, brew.Attractive design. Happy 😊 customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Died After Two Uses
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for a friend and while brewing the first cup of coffee, the machine gave off a burning plastic smell. She assumed that was normal and brewed a 2nd cup of coffee that afternoon. Both cups were rich and flavorful, no complaints. The following morning though, the machine wouldn't operate and the lights flashed on it.We tried contacting customer service five days ago and haven't heard back, so we've requested a refund. I know this item has good reviews so I didn't think twice to order it, but looking back I now see several one-star reviews exactly as mine. Maybe a handful of these have faulty motherboards or circuitry? I'm not sure but I wouldn't trust a replacement.I had this shipped overseas so returning and replacing is a big process- I really wish customer service could have responded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little Machine for any kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe it only takes 1-2 minutes to make a really hot coffee! Makes every morning just a whole lot better! If you work and are always rushing to get a coffee on the way just get one of these and it'll save you a lot of headaches! Definitely recommend and will buy some for gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars fast but weak brew IMO
reviews.reviewText: would be perfect if it had an option to brew more slowly for a deeper bolder brew, so all coffee even if you use your own strong coffee tastes like a pod, no way to get a bold flavor. returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For my 91 yo Dad! Best gift ever!
reviews.reviewText: My dad is active and spry at 91. He loves this coffee maker! It’s like a new toy. For a man who has everything, this is perfect. Easy to use, easy to set up and he enjoys it!
